body: downloads all the card images on a fresh install takes a long time, speed it up by downloading files in parallel.

title: download files in parallel
content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on April 17, 2014 10:47:07_

downloads all the card images on a fresh install takes a long time, speed it up by downloading files in parallel.
